ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And indeed the disbelievers used to say, –
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And indeed they used to say:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And surely they used to say:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And indeed they used to say:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And they surely were wont to say:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And there were those who said,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And indeed they (Arab pagans) used to say;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Even though they used to say.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And indeed, the disbelievers used to say,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:167] And indeed (in, is softened in place of the hardened one) they, the Meccan disbelievers, used to say,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And indeed they) the people of Mecca (used to say) before the coming of Muhammad (pbuh) to them: 518
